parameters.content:
## Call for issues in Easy Redmine & send relevant information to MS teams channel
**1) GET requested ticket by ID via "Easy Redmine node"**
**2) "Edit fields" - keep relevant data** such as description and created URL 
**3) "AI Agent" - use AI Agent to summarize request ticket according description and to suggest a solution**
**4) Send the message via "MS Teams node"** - use technical user & select relevant teams channel or chat

## Final Output:

### ❗️New ticket was created:

**Subject:** Export to PDF is not working
**Ticket ID:** [1354](https://www.easyredmine.com)
**Priority**: High 
**AI Summary:**

Main issue:
User cannot export reports to PDF format. When attempting export, the system either shows a blank page or downloads an incomplete file.

Priority of the issue:
Medium priority – while not blocking all work, it affects key reporting functionality and could impact scheduled client deliveries.

Recommended possible solution:
As an IT expert, I recommend the following steps:

Verify that the PDF generation service is running and accessible from the application.

Check for recent changes in report templates that might cause rendering issues.

Review application and server logs for error messages during the export process.

Test PDF export with smaller datasets to see if file size or complexity is causing failures.

Ensure the PDF library or export plugin is up to date and compatible with the current application version.

## Helpdesk Ticket Notification to MS Teams 
**Try out using a native Easy Redmine node to get new requested ticket according saved filter and send them to your MS Teams Channel.**

### About Workflow
This workflow sends a message to a Microsoft Teams channel when a new helpdesk ticket is created in Easy Redmine. It’s a simple alternative or addition to traditional email notifications.

### Use Case 
Any team working with Help Desk tickets in Easy Redmine can benefit from automatic summary send to Teams channel - making sure all tickets are addressed in time & no more searching and checking filters.


### How it works
- Set webhook will ensure the automatic run whenever a new ticket request is created
=> Webhook type POST
=> Insert n8n webhook URL to your active Easy Redmine Webhook which can be created at https://easy-redmine-application.com/easy_web_hooks
- Easy Redmine node will GET a new ticket request whenerver it is created in the system, this is ensure by saved filter
=> Issues | Get One | Issue ID
- Edit fields - description for AI agent and creation of field URL to your application URL/issues/{{ $json.issue.id }} 
- AI Agent summarize description
- Send to MS Teams - by native MS Teams node
=> Chat Message | Create | Selected Channel | HTML content
=> HTML content mapped from edit fields node

### How to use
- Adjust the set-up to your team's need
- Use the workflow for multiple teams
- Map incoming query parameters (e.g. title, priority, description) in the workflow.
- Customize the MS Teams message layout for clarity

### Requirements 
- Easy Redmine application
=> ideally technical user for API calls with specific permissions
- MS Teams
=> ideally technical user for API calls with specific permissions

### Need Help? 
- Reach out through n8n community => https://community.n8n.io/u/easy8.ai
- Contant our team directly => Easy8.ai
- Visit our youtube channel => https://www.youtube.com/@easy8ai
